WorkItem.Description: I am trying to figure out the optimal arcane cycles for my mage, however whenever I press the "compute optimal arcane cycles" button the program locks up permamently (I have left it running for 30 min with no change. When the program is locked I am still able to minimize the program and do other tasks on my computer. I have attached the file that I was using optimize the cycles, however I have tried it under a number of different gear and computation set-ups and the feature still locks up.
WorkItem.Summary: [Mage] Program is locking up when computing optimal arcane cycles

Comments.Message: I believe there was an issue with it that cause this behavior and was fixed, I don't remember exactly when. Can you try to see if it locks up in beta version also? Otherwise I'll check it out when I get a chance (running some long sequnce reconstructions at the moment).
